info.title: ERCOT ESR API Client/Developer Documentation
info.description: Client/Developer RESTFul web services documentation for ERCOT Public Data products.

post.summary: Download a Data Product historical archive.
post.description: Download a Data Product bundle archive by generating a JSON request with a single 'docIds' element containing the document identifier you wish to download.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Data Product identifier for the desired archive bundle.

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
parameters.description: The subscription key assigned to your ERCOT Public API account.

400.description: The request operation failed. The request and/or one or more of its parameters are invalid.

403.description: The request operation failed. You do not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: The request operation failed. The requested resource does not exist.

post.summary: Download a collection of Data Product archives.
post.description: Download a collection of Data Product archives by generating a JSON request with a single 'docIds' element containing the document identifiers you wish to download.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Data Product identifier for the desired set of archives.

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
parameters.description: The subscription key assigned to your ERCOT Public API account.

400.description: The request operation failed. The request and/or one or more of its parameters are invalid.

403.description: The request operation failed. You do not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: The request operation failed. The requested resource does not exist.

get.summary: Energy Storage Resource Four Second Data
get.description: Energy Storage Resource Four Second Data

parameters.name: AGCExecTimeFrom
parameters.description: Format - yyyy-MM-ddTH24:mm:ss.

parameters.name: AGCExecTimeTo
parameters.description: Format - yyyy-MM-ddTH24:mm:ss.

parameters.name: DSTFlag
parameters.description: Format - true | false.

parameters.name: AGCExecTimeUTCFrom
parameters.description: Format - yyyy-MM-ddTH24:mm:ss.

parameters.name: AGCExecTimeUTCTo
parameters.description: Format - yyyy-MM-ddTH24:mm:ss.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Format - ###. Page number of returned values in the collection.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Format - ###. Number of returned items per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Format - abc123. Single or comma separated list of fields by which to sort the returned resource values. The default sort order for each field is ascending, but can be changed to descending by adding a '-' (minus) suffix to the field name.

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: Format - abc123. Defines sort order of returned values based on a single field specified by the 'sort' parameter, or the primary business key of the resource if no sort field is specified. Valid values are 'asc' and 'desc'

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
parameters.description: The subscription key assigned to your ERCOT Public API account.

get.description: Retrieve all available (active) products in the current Data registry having public accessibility.

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
parameters.description: The subscription key assigned to your ERCOT Public API account.

400.description: The request operation failed. The request and/or one or more of its parameters are invalid.

403.description: The request operation failed. You do not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: The request operation failed. The requested resource does not exist.

Archive.description: Represents a Data Product archive file.

ArchiveRequest.description: Represents a multi-document download request in JSON format.

Artifact.description: Each artifact represents a single report for the given time period designated by the Data Product metadata.

Exception.description: Represents any exception encountered while access API endpoints.

Product.description: Represents a Data Product, which includes its metadata along with all Artifact information.

ProductHistory.description: Each archive represents a single Data Product archive (zip file).

ProductHistoryMetadata.description: Represents record and paging summary for the specified query results.

QueryMetadata.description: Represents query parameter summary for the specified query results.

Report.description: Represents report data search results from any artifact report query.

ReportMetadata.description: Represents general metadata for the specified report artifact, including the parent Data Product identifier.

ResultMetadata.description: Represents record and paging summary for the specified query results.
